intro.name: Kyle Cilia
intro.bio: Hi! My name is Kyle. I enjoy building web applications and IT projects. Hardware enthusiast and passionate about clean, modular code. Perpetually learning and improving my crafts.
education: B.Sc in Computer Science: Game Design - UC Santa Cruz
Web Development Certification - UC Berkeley Extension

projects.title: Moto Weather
projects.description: A full, MERN stack, web application with the aim to help motorcycle riders adapt to the changing weather.

projects.title: New York Times Scraper
projects.description: A single page, MERN based scraper for the New York Times world page.

projects.title: Brewery Browser
projects.description: A simple, single page web application designed to make finding a brewery or alehouse in a target location an easy experience.

projects.title: Giphy Search
projects.description: A Giphy API search client. Features toggling between still image and animated gif, user search buttons, and gif ratings.

projects.title: Weekend Warrior
projects.description: A tool meant for hikers and campers to look up the conditions and weather, local to a hiking trail.
